我知道，现在黎明杀机为了跟上各类游戏的脚程，正在更新自己的服务器，这确实没什么问题。
但是，他这个测试反而让玩家游戏体验更差了。
我们是要好看的皮肤没错。
我们是要牛逼的屠夫没错。
我们是要新颖的人类没错。
可是，这服务器越改越烂是为什么？
中国IP和中国IP一起玩真的一点问题都没有，强行揉进其它地区的IP，排在一起，延迟简直惊人。
土豆服务器果然名不虚传。
我玩这个游戏，是为了能和国服的好朋友们，认识我的人玩。
现在这个匹配机制，让我和素不相识的他国玩家共进游戏，根本没有任何体验。
不救队友甩头就走，上钩刷分行云流水。
屠夫守尸理所应当，技术不够配件来凑。
制作组求求你看看我。
我们国服玩家，想要的是好的游戏体验，
而不是排的更快，
又或者进游戏更加顺畅。
真的不是啊。

After a decent amount of time spent in the game(closing in at 100 hours), experienced an event and a couple of updates/patches i can say that DBD is a great game overall. A unique genre of it's own, immersive with various elements describing the game as: Teamwork, Survival, Horror, Action, Mystery, Strategy, Stealth. 

You can focus on any of the above or all of them all together because the base characteristic defining the game on the first sight is Stealth, but most of the time it ends up being intense chases, run for your life and evade the killer situations. You also can choose to play support to other players, be aggresive and make various moves to the killer(stun, distract etc), or defensive and hide so you can focus on the main goal of the game(fix Generators). You can be a team player and save others or play solo(not recommended).

When this game was free for a few days and i tried i found it just enjoyable fun game, then i liked it more, then i decided to buy it on the next sales. So i did and didn't regret it all. (Only thing i may have regreted is not getting some DLC's for a couple of € cause i am against paybale DLC's but i got to see that most of the characters are worh it.)

Half the characters are farmable to get for free,  the rest of them(killers especially) are only buyable with money. At the start of the game experience it causes intensity, agony, and maybe fear. When you get used to it, it can be action packed, fun, and some times even funny.(Depends if you play with friends or not, Survivor or Killer).

The Community is typical Online-Gaming-like, starting with toxic players who blaim you for anything in chat, disconnecting too easily without penalties and same thing for Killers some times. But you can also come across a friendly Killer who may let someone live because others were unfair, and friendly teammates who actually help you.

⇧ Nice Graphics
Great Concept
Cool Gameplay
Good Content with Various Playstyles/Maps/Characters
Affordable Price that's VfM
Runs Smooth
Easy to learn hard to master

⇩ Toxicity/ Trolls
An in game chat for Survivors would be nice
Licensed DLC's require Real Money
It could use diversity in Maps and Modes
Manages to have both sides complaining that it's Unbalanced but this probably isn't a "real" Con, but a Toxic one ㋡

✍ Recommended 9/10

One of the most horrifying and extreme games I've ever played. All of the maps has their own difficulties and different game styles plus the graphic quality is amazing. I must admit that the game is hard to play but maybe the secret formula that made this game amazing was that. I highly reccomend playing online with your friends.

MUCHO TEXTO

Hace cosa de dos años escribí una reseña y creo que es hora de hacer una nueva, con más horas de juego y tantos cambios que han realizado.

Lo primero es que el juego es muy divertido (sobre todo con amigos), pero solo también es divertido, no te vas a aburrir a no ser que te toque un equipo malito, una premade de 5 o un asesino campero. Si te toca una de esas tres opciones pues gg y siguiente partida.

Es de agradecer que en estos dos años hayan actualizado tanto el juego, antes estaba super descompensado (me acuerdo cuando la gente saboteaba todos los ganchos y el killer no podía hacer nada), también han metido más mapas, más asesinos y supervivientes, aunque estos dos últimos algunos son de pago.

En conclusión, es un juego divertido y que ofrece algo nuevo. Eso sí, tiene muchos bugs y los servidores dedicados son una mierda, espero que lo cambien pronto.

Оставляю свой обзор сразу после первого запуска! Купил игру за 250 рублей - по скидке. Имел огромное желание сравнить эту игру с Пятницей 13-го. При первом запуске очень сильно порадовало - обучение, как за убийцу, так и за человека :)! Не просто игра с ботами, иди и учить, а краткое, но понятное обучение. Очень простое меню, с которы разберется любой человек. Есть игровая валют, за которую можно покупать что-либо, так же DONAT. В целом игра понравился(по первому впечатлению) и недорогая цена, тем более по скидке если.

                                              РЕКОМЕНДУЮ "ДЕАД БУ ДЕЛАЙТ"

Dead by Daylight представляет собой уникальную и очень атмосферную игру (из альтернатив разве что грядущая Friday the 13th: The Game и серия кривоватеньких игр на основе Slender: Slendytubbies, Survivers и т.д.). Если вжиться в роль, то можно испытать целый спектр эмоций. 

Увы, веселье быстро заканчивается. Ты ловишь себя на мысли, что убийство афроамериканки первой уже не доставляет тебе такого удовольствия, как раньше. Тут сказывается количество контента, которого сущие крохи. 

Помимо этого, встречаются достаточно глупые баги. Многие из них, впрочем, можно простить.
''i think we did a pretty good job so far''

After a long time of not playing the game, i came back to play some rounds as killer. 
It was horrible. In a time frame of 2 hours, i managed to play 2 games. Actually 3 but the first one straight up disconnected me after launching in. So in both games i played as a rank 17 killer (which is really low) against rank 1, 2 and 5 survivors and of course i didn´t have quite the best time. 
If the game was actually still playable in a normal way  i would probably give this game a positive review, but this is just garbage. It was a cool game for a long time, but as far as i see this it has gotten unplayable.
Don´t buy this or any dlc for it if you are not 100% sure that you want to sink in a lot of time waiting just to play as noob against top rated players that just bully you even tho you are the one supposed to kill them.

The game shines with its amazing simplicity. It's simple: If you take on the role of the killer, your experience will tell you that you will be the target of malicious and cheeky survivors. That makes you resort to unfair means. On the other hand, if you play the role of survivor, your experience will tell you that you will be dealing with killers who use unfair means to get kills particularly quickly. That is why you become malicious and cheeky. The game rounds usually last 5 to 10 minutes. The search for a lobby, on the other hand, sometimes takes half an hour. If you play as a killer, the tendency is increasing here. That is all there is to say about the game. The rest are unimportant details that nobody cares about anyway.

I understand that some people are disappointed by the community and the bugs the games has, but take in consideration that the devs are doing their best to improve all the black dots in this game. Let me tell you that this game is not bad. The community makes it bad.

1. When I first had Dead by daylight in my hands (Console back then) I fell in love with the game and I couldn't stop playing. There are a lot of survivors and killers. 4 survivors and 1 killer in a random map. You must complete all 5 generators to open the gate and escape from the killer. Of course, it won't be easy. It's entertaining, but people sometimes can be harsh for stupid reasons, and we are gonna talk about that in the next paragraph.

2. People. YES there are salty people, like in ALL games out there. you will, with no doubt, encounter a salty premade or killer. The salty killer is not offensive, but survivors are mostly. They bodyblock you just because: ''They didn't have a good day''  or basically just because they are grumpy and want to bring misery to others. I don't understand the people that doesn't like to play for fun. One thing for sure, is that you can't complain about the community to the developers. It's not on their hands. Why?`because it's not that easy to wipe out these salty pimples. They are like mites stuck in a dogs furr. 

3. The game itself is REALLY entertaining and VERY funny. The people are just idiots (if you excuse my language) I dont hate the game, but I do dislike the specific ''I am so proud of myself''  kind of people. They blame you for every mistake they make and they get away with it. Ignore these pimples and enjoy playing with friends, trust me. Now this ''TUNNELER YOU F**** S***'' and this ''CAMPER PIECE OF GARBAGE'' and this '' HACKER MOTHEF*****'' is everywhere :D but ignore it.

4. If you dislike repetitive games, then this is not your game. People argue about it being the same over and over, but the point is surviving from a killer and that's all. killers will be added every year, survivors as well with different mechanics. The game will evolve. Just be patient. Bugs show up and then vanish, it's normal for a game. All online games has it. 

Give the developers a moment to breath because they can't fix things that fast and easy. Find some cool friends in steam and play together if you think that other players are dumb, easy. Buy the game, It's very good and I recommend it.
